== Available backups ==
<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/37/Nuvola_devices_3floppy_mount.png" width=100px alt="Download available backups" title="Download available backups" align=right />
*!WikiTeam* has made a lot of *wiki backups*. Please, consider to download them and help to preserve all human knowledge. Here you have a list:

  * *[http://code.google.com/p/wikiteam/downloads/list?num=5000 Downloads section]* at Google Code (150+ wikis)
  * *[http://archive.org/details/wikiteam WikiTeam Collection]* at Internet Archive (10,000+ wikis) ‚Üê It is our central repository and may contain all the dumps
  * *[http://mirrors.sdboyd56.com/WikiTeam/index.html Scott Boyd's server]* (200+ wikis)
  * *[http://archive.org/details/shoutwiki.com ShoutWiki wikifarm August 2011]* backup (397 wikis)
  * *Wikkii wikifarm December 2011* backup (pending upload)
  * *[http://archive.org/details/wikifarm-referata.com-20130824 Referata wikifarm (August 2013)]* backup (archiving)
  * *[http://wikiindex.org/List_of_wikibackups List of wikibackups]* at WikiIndex
  * Some wikis preserve pages deleted by Wikip/media community:
    * *[http://deletionpedia.dbatley.com DeletionPedia]* saved [http://deletionpedia.dbatley.com/w/index.php?title=Special:Statistics 62,000+ deleted pages] from English Wikipedia ([http://archive.org/details/wiki-deletionpedia.dbatley.com backup])
    * *[http://de.pluspedia.org PlusPedia]* saved [http://de.pluspedia.org/wiki/Kategorie:WikiPedia_Deleted 13,000+ deleted pages] from German Wikipedia ([http://code.google.com/p/wikiteam/downloads/list?can=2&q=pluspedia backup])
    * *[http://speedydeletion.wikia.com Speedy deletion Wiki]* preserves [http://speedydeletion.wikia.com/wiki/Special:Statistics 140,000+ deleted pages] from several wikis ([http://wikistats.wikia.com/s/sp/speedydeletion/pages_full.xml.gz backup], [http://archive.org/details/speedydeletionwiki dumps on Internet Archive])
  * *[http://archive.org/details/wikimediacommons Wikimedia Commons Grab]* (2004-2013)
  * *[http://archive.org/details/wiki-encitizendiumorg Citizendium 2012-04-15]* dump (full history)
  * *[http://archive.org/details/wikia_dump_20121204 Wikia wikifarm January 2013]* backup (34,174 wikis)
  * *[http://archive.org/details/wikifarm-orain.org-20130824 Orain.org wikifarm (August 2013)]* backup (16 wikis)
  * We are working on many more. Do you want to help? [http://groups.google.com/group/wikiteam-discuss Talk with us] and join to the *TaskForce*.

Most backups include the XML with the full page histories and images. You need a MediaWiki to import all the data. Read [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Importing_XML_dumps this] and [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:ImportImages.php this] to know how to import a backup.

Have you made any wiki backup? Leave a comment and a link below. You also can join to our *[Mirrors Mirrors]* volunteers. Thanks!

== Wiki projects offering backups ==

Some wiki communities offer backups of their content (usually only wikitext, not images):
  * [http://dumps.wikimedia.org Wikipedia dumps] ([http://ftpmirror.your.org/pub/wikimedia/imagedumps/tarballs/ image dumps] finally too!)
  * [http://wiki-stats.wikia.com Wikia dumps]
  * [http://en.citizendium.org/wiki/CZ:Downloads Citizendium dumps] (only current revision, not full histories)
  * [http://en.gentoo-wiki.com/wiki/Gentoo_Linux_Wiki:Backup Gentoo Linux Wiki dumps]
  * [http://www.omegawiki.org/Development OmegaWiki dumps]
  * [http://wiki.osdev.org/OSDev_Wiki:About OSDev dumps]
  * [http://dumps.wikifur.com Wikifur dumps]
  * [http://rationalwiki.org/wiki/RationalWiki:Content_dumps RationalWiki dumps]
  * [http://www.shoutwiki.com/dumps/ ShoutWiki dumps]
